title: Animation_from pencils to pixels.dmg
description:
this is the companion cd that comes with the book "Animation: pencils to pixels". Its not the actual book but a multimedia pdf addendum to the book chronicling the making of  "Endangered Species". Its chock full of embedded movies and is a neat epilogue to the book.
